00026 #ifndef _INTNODE_H
00027 #define _INTNODE_H
00028 
00029 
00030 // Node type for an ordered linked list of integers with a dummy head node
00031 class IntNode {
00032 private:
00033    IntNode(int i = 0, IntNode* p = 0);   // Constructor.
00034    IntNode* copy() const;                // Returns a deep copy.
00035   ~IntNode();                      // Deallocates the next node.
00036 
00037    void insertAfter(int x);              // Adds x in the proper position in
00038                                          //   the chain after this node.
00039    void removeAfter(int x);              // Removes the first occurrence of 
00040                                          //   x in the chain after this node.
00041    bool containsAfter(int x) const;      // Does the chain after this node 
00042                                          //   contain x?
00043    int info_;
00044    IntNode* link_;
00045 
00046 friend class IntList;
00047 friend class IntIterator;
00048 };
00049 
00050 #endif
